It comes down to what you are trying to do - i.e. how will your game run.

If you are exploring an area, trying to pick up inventory and solve a mystery or whatever, then Quest would be the way to do. It's very much like those old Adventure games.

However, if you are trying to make a more flow-through storyline, you might check Squiffy. 

Personally, I prefer squiffy. I don't need a lot of things Quest offers and I've come up with detailed, randomized games with it. But everyone has their favorite.
